title: Australian identity. Yrs 7-10
brief_description: A program presented in ten segments on the Australian identity. 1. What’s an identity? 2. What’s an Australian? 3. Popular legends. 4. Aboriginal identity. 5. People left out of our legends. 6. Defiance of authority. 7. The Anzac legend. 8. White colonial Australia. 9. Legends about women. 10. Changing national identity. Uses extracts from early Australian feature films and stills to focus on the question of who are Australians.
